text: Shlomo Deri is an Israeli lawyer, businessman, politician, and founder of the Respect for Tradition Party (Kovod U’Mesoret Party). He is part of Shas negotiating team that will negotiate its position in the government following the 2015 Israeli legislative election. He is a brother of Aryeh Deri. ==See also== *Yehuda Deri ==References== Category:Living people Category:Israeli Jews Category:Leaders of political parties in Israel Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Shlomo Deri
